about_the_game:
Grapplers: Relic Rivals

Engage in fast-paced local PvP matches while unearthing ancient relics and harnessing their power to conquer your rivals. Dodge deadly traps, utilize your grappling hook, activate mystical runes, and master each relic to defeat your opponents and reign victorious in this thrilling PvP platformer!

Inspired by some of the best party games of all time, Grapplers: Relic Rivals offers accessible gameplay for players of all skill levels coupled with a depth that demands dedication to truly master. The competition is fierce!

Key Features:

  • Use your trusty grappling hook to traverse with ease, steal relics, damage your enemies, activate mystical runes, and more!
  • Collect relics or steal them from your foes to discover powerful combinations of relics
  • Experience exhilarating local PvP with multiple winning strategies - Gather coins around the level, collect or steal relics to grow in power, or defeat your rivals and take their hard-earned coins
  • Dodge deadly traps (Or don't!)
  • Coinsplosions!
  • Amass treasure (AKA booty)
  • Sail the high seas as a plundering buccaneer, seizing booty as your own, or take a stand as an ancient tomb guardian and defend your domain against trespassers
  • 2- to 4-player competitive platforming
  • Winners wear a crown

Main Game Features Not In Demo:

  • Single player challenge mode
  • Many more levels with different traps
  • More options, including Game Changers like Exploding Corpses, Gravity Adjustment, and Movement Speed Modifier
  • Additional relics
  • Loads of gameplay updates and bug fixes

name: Grapplers: Relic Rivals Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews:
“...[Grapplers] followed in the footsteps of some of my favorite indie games. The aesthetic of grabbing relics and competing for the gold brings Spelunky to mind... Add the quick, simple yet intuitive and depth-filled competitiveness of something like Duck Game and you have the makings of a true winner."”
Hard Drive

“This game takes me back to my childhood, when we would gather around the Nintendo Wii and compete with each other. Grapplers elevates that experience, incorporating modern elements to make the gameplay even more enjoyable.”
IndieGames

Dodge deadly traps, utilize your grappling hook, activate mystical runes, and master each relic to defeat your opponents and reign victorious in this thrilling PvP platformer!
